Html:
Due to lack of time I didn't post this earlier but: if you see something wrong with either Assassination or Combat specs please make a ticket. For Subtlety there are some things to keep in mind: HaT is assumed to proc on CD which overvalues it and Ambush has not been modeled yet.
As soon as I have time I'll get the Subtlety model up to date as well, but let's start with getting the bugs out of Assassination and Combat at least.
Excelent, I will take a look tonight and let you know! glad to hear that it is this far along now!
